actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to increase from 50 to 75 percent the U.S. share of allowable project costs payable under such act; to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit State taxation of the carriage of persons in air transportation.
short_title: Air Passenger Safety and Convenience Act

summary.text: Air Passenger Safety and Convenience Act - Increases from 50 to 75 percent the United States share of allowable project costs payable under the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970. Prohibits State taxation of the carriage of persons in air transportation under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958.

titles.title: Air Passenger Safety and Convenience Act

A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to increase from 50 to 75 percent the U.S. share of allowable project costs payable under such act; to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit State taxation of the carriage of persons in air transportation.
